name: Throw. Eliminate.
description:
What if a tile-matching game meets a platformer?

This game is currently under development.

Controls

Keyboard

Arrow keys: move and decide throw direction. do not try to use 'up' to jump.

Space: jump

S: Spawn a new tile

M: Spawn many tiles

F: Hold to grab a tile, release to ... release

R: Reset

Gamepad

You need a gamepad like XBOX, Logitech or one with similiar layout.

Left joystick: Move

B: Jump

A: Toggle grab

Goal

Put 3 or more tiles together to clear them

There is no final goal currently
